activities: Skava develops and hosts mobile commerce websites and applications for its customers. When such websites are accessed by EU/Swiss users, the information submitted by them is transmitted by Skava servers back to the servers of its customers. Skava does not store any such personal information or process it in any way, it only securely passes this information to the customer's servers for processing and handling.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Online customer data from web and mobile sites. Data is not processed manually.
